dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3924 IH: To amend the Public Health Service Act to extend funding for the special diabetes program for type I diabetes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Brooks of Indiana (for herself, Ms. DeGette, and Mr. Reed) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce

form.official-title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to extend funding for the special diabetes program for type I diabetes.

section.header: Extension for special diabetes program for type I diabetes
section.text: Section 330B(b)(2)(C) of the Public Health Service Act (42 U.S.C. 254câ€“2(b)(2)(C)) is amended by striking 2017 and inserting 2019.
